abstract: New York State lawmakers and business leaders are not short of ideas on how to spend $5.7 billion in settlement payments from financial institutions.
lead_paragraph: There is no shortage of ideas from lawmakers and business leaders across the state on how to dole out the money received from settlement payments from financial institutions.

headline.main: Long Line of Suitors for New York State’s $5.4 Billion Windfall
headline.print_headline: Long Line of Suitors and Plenty of Ideas for State’s $5.7 Billion Windfall

snippet: There is no shortage of ideas from lawmakers and business leaders across the state on how to dole out the money received from settlement payments from financial institutions.
